page.title: 17Jam Factory.
page.content: The{Jam Factory}employs eighty workers,mostly women.They work from 8 am.until 5 pm. When there is a lot of work to do they bring extra workers in and work shifts.Staff wear protective clothing in the factory.There are three breaks,in the morning ,a lunch break,and in the afternoon.The workers cannot eat the jam because the jam is boiled and put into the containers at 85 degrees centigrade. The Factory was founded around 1900 by{Samuel Moore.}The flavours of jam they make are:-apple and raspberry,apple and strawberry, apricot,blackcurrant,mixed fruit jam, plum,raspberry,strawberry.The Factory makes mincemeat,marmalade,lemon curd,cornflour,custard powder,baking powder and jelly crystals.They make 40 metric tonnes a day.
